Name: Zoning, 3033 Avenue V Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 240131 ZMK)
Title: Application number C 240131 ZMK (3033 Avenue V Rezoning) submitted by Ford Coyle Properties Inc. pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 29a, eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C1-2 District, changing from an R4 District to an R7D District, and establishing within the proposed R7D District a C2-4 District, property bounded by a line 100 feet northerly of Avenue V, Coyle Street, Avenue V, and Ford Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 46.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
